subdisciplines.name: Embryology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the development of embryos in animals and plants.

subdisciplines.name: Molecular Biology of Development
subdisciplines.description: The study of the molecular mechanisms underlying the process of development.

subdisciplines.name: Evolutionary Developmental Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the evolutionary history of developmental processes and the mechanisms underlying the evolution of developmental processes.

subdisciplines.name: Cellular and Molecular Neuroscience
subdisciplines.description: The study of the cellular and molecular mechanisms underlying the function and development of the nervous system.
